name: Mario Versus Sans
description:
For now, is only a Demo/Prototype.  For now... ;) 

⌨️Mouse & Keyboard Controls
Space or Enter --- Begin and Confirm
WASD --- Movement
Space --- Jump
Shift --- Run (hold)
Control --- Spin Jump
Down + Shift (on air) --- Ground Pound

🎮GamePad Controls (X360)
(A) or Start --- Begin and Confirm
D-Pad or Left Analog Stick --- Movement
(A) --- Jump
(X) --- Run (hold)
(B) --- Spin Jump
Down + (X) (on air) --- Ground Pound
